headline: Is There an Opportunity in Vistra After Surging 136% and Recent AI Power Boom?
summary: If you are scratching your head about what to do with Vistra stock right now, you are not alone. Many investors are paying attention as shares have experienced a significant rise recently, and it is not just hype. Vistra’s price has surged nearly 25% over the past three months and is up an impressive 136% in the last year, far outpacing the S&P 500. Even long-term holders have reason to smile, with 3-year and 5-year total returns of more than 700% and 1,000%, respectively. At the same time,...

headline: Talen Energy: Focus On Long-Term Prospects, Not Momentum
